Obrigado por escolher OsmAnd. \nPara utilizar todos os recursos do aplicativo, você necessidade de alguns dados regionais, que você pode baixar (Configurações -> Dados) ou preparar você mesmo. Depois, Você poderá procurar por um endereço, um Ponto de Interesse (POI), um meio de transporte.

Configure online or cached tile map sources
This plugin facilitates using a variety of online or cached tile maps as base map or as overlay / underlay maps. These maps can also be prepared offline and copied to the OsmAnd folder.
This plugin allows tracking or navigation in sleep (screen off) mode by periodically waking up the GPS device.
This plugin configures special accessibility features.
This plugin facilitates recording your trips to GPX files or live tracking using a web service.
This plugin provides advanced map configuration and some device-specific settings.
This plugin enables development and debugging features like animated navigation or rendering performance display.
Touch a Plugin to activate or deactivate it. (Restarting OsmAnd may be required.)
Plugins provide extra functionality bundled within the application like tile maps, tracking, sleep mode operation, accessibility settings, and others.

"Changes in 0.8.0 : 
	- Plugin functionality 
	- New offline map data support 
	- Improve usability and simplify Profile concept 
	- Lots of bug fixes "
This plugin facilitates OSM feedback like collecting / modifying OSM POI objects, opening / commenting OSM bugs, and contributing recorded GPX files (requires OSM credentials).
Vector maps likely display faster. May not work well on some devices.
Play commands of currently selected voice
No offline vector map present for this location. You can download one in Settings (Offline data), or switch to online maps.

"Changes in 0.7.2 : 
	- Native rendering for all devices 
	- Offline POI editing 
	- Accessibility 
	- Lots of bug fixes "
Please specify OSM user name and password to upload GPX files.

Use fluorescent colors to display tracks and routes

"Changes in 0.7.1 : 
	- Offline POI editing 
	- Live Tracking option - send coordinates to web service periodically (read how to setup your own web service in HowTo Articles) 
	- Show currently recorded track on map 
	- Direction detection: 'Make U-turn' is indicated and announced when heading in opposite direction or after missing a turn 
	- New voice prompt 'Route recalculated' 
	- Optical indication of an imminent turn within 100m by diretion arrow changing color 
	- Actuality also of deactivated index files now shown on Download screen in dark green and dark blue 
	- Other changes "
POI changes inside application do not affect downloaded map files, changes are saved to local file instead.
Show and manage OSM POIs/Bugs noted in local database
Send tracking to a specified web service
Specify the web address with parameter syntax : lat={0}, lon={1}, timestamp={2}, hdop={3}, altitude={4}, speed={5}
Please enable \'Log track to GPX\' Tracking settings.

"Changes in 0.7.0 : 
	- Offline wikipedia data with articles 
	- Updated maps 
	- Other small features "
This free OsmAnd version is limited to %1$s downloads %2$s and does not support offline wikipedia articles.
File with previously exported favorites already exists. Do you want to replace it?

You can choose whether and how the map display is rotated in 'Settings' -> 'Map appearance' -> 'Map rotation'. 
	The choices are: 
	'Don't rotate' - Map will not be rotated. North will be always up 
	'To direction of movement' - Map will continuously be aligned with your heading 
	'To compass' - Map will continuously be aligned with device compass reading 
	Hint: To quickly change between rotation by compass and the one you selected in settings, you can simply tap on the compass needle in map view.
Download successful.\n\t\n\tTo use activate \'Settings\' -> \'Map configuration\' -> \'Offline vector maps\'.

The map appearance can for some vector maps be changed between day (brighter) and night (darker). 
	Night colors are safer for night driving. 
	You can set a policy for day/night switching in 'Settings' -> 'Map appearance' ->'Day/night mode'. 
	Choices are: 
	'Sunrise/Sunset' - automatic mode, controlled by position of the sun (default) 
	'Day' - always use day mode 
	'Night' - always use night mode 
	'Light sensor' - map appearance is controlled by light sensor of your device (only if equipped)

OsmAnd uses maps based on Openstreetmap.org (OSM) data and -besides map viewing and navigation- can be used to improve OSM data quality. You can easily create and upload new POI or OSM bug reports with just a few clicks! 
	For this you need to first provide your OSM login information in 'Settings' -> 'General settings' -> 'OSM Editing'. 
	To add a new POI use option 'Create POI' in the map context menu. Proceed with entering the information about the new POI in 'Create POI' dialog and finally commit it. 
	Errors in maps can immediately be reported via OSM bug, and OSM community can then faster fix this problem. 
	To add a OSM bug use option 'Open OSM bug' in the map context menu. Then enter the detailed description of the problem and finally post it using the 'Add' button. 
	Please note that Internet connectivity is needed for OSM POI and and OSM bug contributions.
There is not enough free space to download %1$s MB (free: %2$s).
Free space now {2} MB! Download {0} file(s) ({1} MB)?

\tYou can select a destination directly in the map (context menu, then \'Set as destination\'), in all search activities, or via long pressing an entry in your \'List of Favorite Points\'. \n\tThe destination is marked as an orange disk on the map and OsmAnd displays the distance to it and the direction to it (orange triangle).

"Changes in 0.6.9 : 
	- Improved offline map rendering 
	- Fast Native offline rendering - look in experimental features (may not work on some devices) 
	- Massive look and feel changes 
	- Altitude info 
	- New translations (Vienamese, Polish) 
	- Other small features "
Native library is not supported on this device.
Time until map view synchronizes with current position
Auto-center map view only while navigating.

"Changes in 0.6.8 : 
	- Completely redesigned search (POI, Address)! Make address search much faster and more responsive. Create one Search interface with many different options. 
	- Implement POI search by name in big areas (countries) 
	- Fix flickering map screen for tablets (Issue 641) 
	- Auto-center map view option (Issue 356) 
	- GPX navigation moved to 'Directions' and 'Save Directions' moved to 'About route' 
	- POI data included in .obf file (all download indexes after 01/10/11) 
	- Voice prompt fixes (GPS position fix, omitting first command) 
	- Small improvements "
File with that name already exists.
Several POI categories found matching the query :
Local data to search POI is not present.
The POI data file \'%1$s\' is redundant and can be deleted.
Local file to maintain POI changes not found and could not be created.
Server contains map files not compatible with your current version of the application. To download and use them, please upgrade the application to newer version.

"Recent changes for 0.6.7 : 
	- Offline data manager (download, delete, activate / deactivate offline data directly in OsmAnd) 
	- Favorite points and groups (categorize, delete, manage favorites) 
	- GPX Explorer in application (view track detail, distance, average speed, elevation, etc.) 
	- GPX navigation (more options, continue navigation after crash, support roundabouts) 
	- Function to save route as GPX track for offline use 
	- Improve GPX monitoring (filter some inaccurate position and save accuracy/elevation/speed) 
	- Upload GPX to OSM community (http://download.osmand.net/gpx/) 
	- Improve vector rendering 
	- Improvement of TTS engine (announce exact distance, enable miles) 
	- Bug fixes "
File with same name already exists.
Upload GPX files to OSM community. They will be used to improve maps.

Internet connection required for operation is not available

Having up-to-date map data is essential. OsmAnd provides a download manager which can check for available offline data updates. 
	To check for updates go to 'Settings' -> 'Offline data' -> 'Download offline data'. After region list is retrieved from the internet, you can select option 'Menu' -> 'Filter downloaded' to indicate updates only for data already on your device. 
	The availability of updates is depicted by the following colors: 
	'Green' - indicates data files identical on device and server 
	'Blue' - indicates available updates on server
Minimum zoom level to use vector maps

Você pode compartilhar a localização de lugares interessantes em sua viagem com a família ou amigos. 
	Para partes qualquer local que você deseja: 
	Usar 'menu de contexto Mapa' -> 'Compartilhar local' menu. 
	Then selecionar uma forma de partilhar a sua localização. As opções são: e-mail, SMS (texto), ou apenas a localização cópia coordena a área de transferência.

Frequently used points can be saved as Favorites. 
	To save a point as Favorite go to the map context menu, select option 'Add to favorites' and then enter a name for it. After saving a Favorite, it is accessible via 'Main Menu' -> 'Favorites'. 
	Long pressing on a Favorite in the 'Favorites' menu provides options to set it as desination, Edit or Delete it. 
	To display all Favorite points directly on the map, enable layer 'Favorites' in 'Map context menu' ->'Define view'.
" Online OSM map classification with images"

\tThe fastest way to change the map source and layers displayed is pressing \'Menu\' -> \'Define view\' in map view. \n\tUnder \'Map source…\' you can choose using the pre-loaded offline vector maps, predefined (online) tile sources, or maps manually created using e.g. OsmAndMapCreator on a PC. \n\tOsmAnd also supports custom sources.
\tOsmAnd supports different (customizable) application profiles for different use cases. \n\tYou can change profiles in \'Menu\' -> \'Settings\' -> \'User Profile\', or when creating a route.
\tBefore starting a navigation you need to select a destination. Afterwards press \'Menu\' -> \'Directions\' on map and select the navigation type.

\tYou can search for places directly on the map, or by address, by location, as POI, or as predefined favorite. \n\tPressing \'Search\' in the main menu opens the search activities. For all hits a context menu offers 2 options: \'Set as destination\' or \'Show on map\'.

\tThe map context menu is available by pressing and holding on the map or by pressing the trackball button. \n\tThis produces a box with point coordinates. To open the map context menu dialog, tap on it. (Or press and hold on it to hide the box again.) \n\tThe map context menu contains all actions referring to a point (location).
\tOsmAnd é um aplicativo de navegação com muitos recursos. \n\tComo uma introdução básica, algumas dicas de uso e truques estão ligados na tela principal.
Change units of length and speed

Alterações na 0.8.3: 
	* orientação de rota Melhorada 
	* Evitar auto-estradas opção 
	* Ciclovia = faixa de exibição 
	* melhor acabamento UI (ícones) 
	* Algumas correções de bugs
Encaixe posição de estradas durante a navegação
OsmAnd é uma aplicação de navegação de código aberto para mapas offline e online
OsmAnd é uma aplicação de navegação de código aberto para mapas offline e online
Evitar estradas com portagem, não pavimentadas, balsas

OsmAnd (Direções OSM automatizados de navegação)
OsmAnd é uma aplicação de navegação livre com acesso a uma ampla variedade de globais OpenStreetMap (OSM) de dados. Todos os dados de mapas (mapas vetoriais ou telha) podem ser armazenados no cartão de memória do telefone para uso offline. OsmAnd também oferece offline e online, incluindo a funcionalidade de roteamento turn-by-turn orientação por voz.
Algumas das características principais: - Completa funcionalidade offline (mapas baixados da loja vetor ou telha em uma pasta selecionável) - Compacto off-line mapas vetoriais para o mundo inteiro disponível - Faça o download de mapas de países ou região diretamente do aplicativo - Sobreposição de camadas de mapas diversos possíveis, como GPX ou navegação faixas, Pontos de Interesse, favoritos, curvas de nível, paragens de transportes públicos, mapas adicionais com transparência personalizável - Pesquisa offline para endereços e locais (POIs) - Encaminhamento offline para distâncias curtas (experimental) - Carro, bicicleta, e os modos de pedestres com: - Opcional vista de dia/noite automático de comutação - Mapa em função da velocidade opcional zoom - Alinhamento mapa opcional de acordo com bússola ou direção do movimento - Orientação pista opcional, display de limite de velocidade, registradas e vozes TTS
Limitações desta versão gratuita de OsmAnd: - Número de downloads de mapa limitado - Sem acesso a Wikipedia off-line POIs
OsmAnd está sendo ativamente desenvolvida e nosso projeto e seu progresso depende ainda contribuições financeiras para financiar o desenvolvimento e testdriving novas funcionalidades. Por favor, considere a compra de OsmAnd, ou financiar novas funcionalidades específicas ou fazer uma doação geral sobre osmand.net.
